message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a competitive price. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, my budget is a bit tighter.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $10,500 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway at $11,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair deal considering the value the product offers.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a bit above my comfort zone.  I'm prepared to go up to $11,000.  This is my final offer.
I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but I need to make a bit more on this deal. I can offer you a small concession, but I need to get at least $11,500. This is my final counteroffer.
